One way we achieve brand presence is through annotated images, using our Futura typeface to clearly and helpfully call out features and benefits, along with our OXO logo (on every image save for the first thumbnail). ... Our Amazon Brand Store is straightforward, leading with our categories, ...

OXO was founded on the philosophy of Universal Design, which is the concept of designing products that are easy to use for the largest possible spectrum of people. For OXO, this means designing products for young and old, male and female, left- and right-handed and many with special needs.
